title: Ring Small Solar Panel (USB-C), 1.9W for Ring Spotlight Cam Plus and Ring Spotlight Cam Pro, White

all_images.alt: Ring Small Solar Panel (USB-C), 1.9W for Ring Spotlight Cam Plus and Ring Spotlight Cam Pro, White

raw_desc: Small but powerfulâ€”the compact design makes it easy to place or reposition. Panel dimensions are: 17.5 cm x 11.1 cm x 1.2 cm. 2 m. cable length with USB-C connector. Compatible with new USB-C input Ring Security Cameras: Ring Spotlight Cam Plus, Ring Spotlight Cam Pro. Use the included adapter for backwards compatibility with barrel-plug input Ring Security Cameras: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery (2nd and 3rd generations), Ring Spotlight Cam Battery (1st generation); not compatible with Ring Stick Up Cam (1st Generation). Adjustable arm and built-in cable management. Ring recommends at least 3-4 hours of direct sunlight per day for best performance. One-year limited warranty.
